A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Visually it is a stunner. But Star Wars the Last Jedi failed to deliver a powerfull sequel to the original movies. Between the 'plushies' that have no tue purpose exept being cute\, a clearly present disney vibe that doesn't match the universe of the series. Unanswered questions from previous movie and some clearly untidy senario.
